means: 植物的叶子（总称），叶子及梗和枝

sentence.Network_en: Dig it up once the foliage has died down.
sentence.Network_cn: 叶子掉光后就把它挖出来。

sentence.Network_en: The fall foliage glowed red and yellow in the morning sunlight.
sentence.Network_cn: 树叶在秋日的晨曦中泛出红黄色的光。

sentence.Network_en: The foliage was soft and feathery.
sentence.Network_cn: 叶子如羽毛般轻软柔和。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English foilage (in the sense 'design resembling leaves'): from Old French feuillage, from feuille 'leaf', from Latin folium. The change in the first syllable was due to association with Latin folium

entry.def: The leaves of a plant are referred to as its foliage .

example.tran: 长着灰色或银色叶子的灌木丛

means.word_mean: 1. the main organ of photosynthesis and transpiration in higher plants

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词或动词后缀,表示"状态,总称"; 2. [做的]状态,过程; 3. 名词后缀,表示"费用"; 4. 名词后缀,表示"场所,物品"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dam+age状态,总称→n.损害,伤害
carry携带,运送+age费用→carriage运费
post邮件+age费用→n.邮资
rail铁路+age费用→n.铁路运输,铁路运费
tow拖+age费用→n.拖[船,车]费
water水+age费用→n.水路运输,水运费
anchor铁锚+age场所,物品→n.停泊地点;抛锚地点
append附加+age表示名词→n.附加物
bever饮,喝+age场所,物品→n.[水,酒等之外的]饮料
cot小床,小屋+age场所→cottage村舍,小屋
herit继承+age场所,物品→n.遗产,继承物;传统
hermit隐居士+age场所,物品→n.隐居处
lug拖拉+age物品→需要拖运的物品→luggage行李,皮箱
vill茅屋+age场所,物品→n.村,村庄
wreck残骸+age场所,物品→n.残骸,碎片

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+vant=van前卫,先锋+age状态,总称→n.优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
dot打点,打盹+age状态,总称→n.老年糊涂,溺爱
drain排干+age状态,总称→n.排水;下水道
foli叶+age状态,总称→n.叶子[总称]
marry结婚+age状态,总称→marriage
mile英里+age状态,总称→n.里程
patron赞助人+age状态,总称→n.赞助,惠顾
percent百分比+age状态,总称→n.百分率
pilgrim朝圣+age状态,总称→n.朝圣
short短+age状态,总称→n.不足,缺乏
ton吨+age状态,总称→tonnage吨位
verbi=verb词语+age状态,总称→词的状态→冗长
vis看+age状态,总称→n.脸,面貌
pill抢夺+age状态,总称→n.&v.抢劫,掠夺
en进入+vis看+age[做的]状态→进入看的状态

means.word_mean: 植物的叶子(总称); 叶子及梗和枝

sentences.en: Most trees lose their foliage in winter.
sentences.cn: 大多数树木在冬天落叶。

jushi.english: The path was completely covered by the dense foliage.
jushi.chinese: 小路被树叶厚厚地盖了一层。

jushi.english: The trees renew their foliage every year.
jushi.chinese: 树木每年都重新长出叶子。
